name: Zodiac Run
description:
Zodiac run is a new kind of choice game,
You will progress by trying to answer the questions at the doors you encounter correctly.
"Which zodiac sign has which characteristics?" "What is the coolest zodiac sign?"
You will seek answers to these questions.
Get ready and pick the right door!
developers: YAMY STUDIO YAZILIM VE OYUN GELISTIRME ANONIM SIRKETI
publishers: YAMY STUDIO YAZILIM VE OYUN GELISTIRME ANONIM SIRKETI
